title: instructions for working with CUDA 11.6
body:
Sharing my experience in getting this to work under CUDA 11.6

1. make a fresh install from Github (I cloned the repository)
2. Install CUDA [11.6 in my case].  I have removed all previous CUDA versions so 11.6 is the only one I had
3. Install PyTorch - the stable version only supports up to 11.3, the nightly build supports 11.6 [instructions here] https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/pytorch-cuda-11-6/149647
4. Install Torchvision - this was to be compiled at source, [instruction here] https://github.com/pytorch/vision/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#development-installation
5. Installed other packages (latest versions of numpy etc have worked for me)

The above setup worked for me - YMMV

Bonus: I ran into a JSON error which was fixed by updating the PATH environment variable.  Reason was because I had my ffmpeg package program files saved within the venv and I deleted it when I fresh installed (see issue #94)
